00029 from Koo.View.AbstractParser import *
00030 
00031 import time
00032 
00033 from Koo.Model import KooModel
00034 
00035 from TreeView import *
00036 from PyQt4.uic import *
00037 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00038 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00039 
00040 from Koo.Fields.FieldWidgetFactory import *
00041 from Koo.Fields.FieldDelegateFactory import *
00042 from Koo.Common import Common
00043 from Koo.Common.Numeric import *
00044 from Koo.Common.Calendar import *
00045 from Koo.Common.ViewSettings import *
00046 
00047 
00048 
00049 class TreeParser(AbstractParser):
00050         def create(self, viewId, parent, model, rootNode, fields):
00051                 # It's expected that parent will be a Screen
00052                 screen = parent
00053 
00054                 attrs = Common.nodeAttributes(rootNode)
00055                 
00056                 view = TreeView( parent, attrs.get('type','tree') )
00057                 view.id = viewId
00058                 if 'gridwidth' in attrs:
00059                         view.setGridWidth( int(attrs['gridwidth']) )
00060                 if 'gridheight' in attrs:
00061                         view.setGridWidth( int(attrs['gridheight']) )
00062 
00063                 view.setOnWriteFunction( attrs.get('on_write', '') )
00064 
00065                 if not view.title:
00066                         view.title = attrs.get('string', 'Unknown' )
00067 
00068                 colors = []
00069                 for color_spec in attrs.get('colors', '').split(';'):
00070                         if color_spec:
00071                                 colour, test = color_spec.split(':')
00072                                 colors.append( ( colour, str(test) ) )
00073 
00074                 header = []
00075                 columns = []
00076                 for node in rootNode.childNodes:
00077                         node_attrs = Common.nodeAttributes(node)
00078                         if node.localName == 'field':
00079                                 fname = node_attrs['name']
00080                                 twidth = {
00081                                         'integer': 60,
00082                                         'float': 80,
00083                                         'date': 70,
00084                                         'datetime': 130,
00085                                         'selection': 130,
00086                                         'char': 140,
00087                                         'one2many': 50,
00088                                 }
00089                                 if 'invisible' in node_attrs:
00090                                         visible = False
00091                                 else:
00092                                         visible = True
00093 
00094                                 if 'readonly' in node_attrs:
00095                                         fields[fname]['readonly'] = bool(int(node_attrs['readonly']))
00096                                 if 'required' in node_attrs:
00097                                         fields[fname]['required'] = bool(int(node_attrs['required']))
00098 
00099                                 if 'sum' in node_attrs and fields[fname]['type'] in ('integer', 'float', 'float_time'):
00100                                         bold = bool(int(node_attrs.get('sum_bold', 0)))
00101                                         label = node_attrs['sum']
00102                                         digits = fields.get('digits', (16,2))
00103                                         view.addAggregate( fname, label, bold, digits ) 
00104 
00105                                 node_attrs.update(fields[fname])
00106 
00107                                 if 'width' in fields[fname]:
00108                                         width = int(fields[fname]['width'])
00109                                 else:
00110                                         width = twidth.get(fields[fname]['type'], 200)
00111                                 header.append( { 'name': fname, 'type': fields[fname]['type'], 'string': fields[fname].get('string', '') })
00112                                 columns.append({ 
00113                                         'width': width , 
00114                                         'type': fields[fname]['type'], 
00115                                         'attributes':node_attrs,
00116                                         'visible': visible
00117                                 })
00118 
00119                 view.finishAggregates()
00120 
00121                 model = KooModel.KooModel( view )
00122                 model.setMode( KooModel.KooModel.ListMode )
00123                 model.setRecordGroup( screen.group )
00124                 model.setFields( fields )
00125                 model.setFieldsOrder( [x['name'] for x in header] )
00126                 model.setColors( colors )
00127                 model.setReadOnly( not attrs.get('editable', False) )
00128                 view.setReadOnly( not attrs.get('editable', False) )
00129 
00130                 if attrs.get('editable', False) == 'top':
00131                         view.setAddOnTop( True )
00132 
00133                 if view.isReadOnly():
00134                         model.setShowBackgroundColor( False )
00135                 else:
00136                         model.setShowBackgroundColor( True )
00137 
00138                 # Here we use a trick to avoid double data loading.
00139                 # If we don't disallow record loading, records would be loaded twice
00140                 # once, in "view.setModel( model )" and another one when Screen loads
00141                 # view.setViewSettings(). What we do here is disallow record loading,
00142                 # run setModel(), load settings and finally allow record loading again.
00143                 # This optimizes Tree View loading times.
00144                 screen.group.setAllowRecordLoading( False )
00145                 view.setModel( model )
00146 
00147                 for column in range( len(columns)):
00148                         current = columns[column]
00149                         if view._widgetType in ('tree','table'):
00150                                 view.widget.setColumnWidth( column, current['width'] )
00151                         if not current['visible']:
00152                                 view.widget.hideColumn( column )
00153 
00154                         delegate = FieldDelegateFactory.create( current['type'], view.widget, current['attributes'] )
00155                         view.widget.setItemDelegateForColumn( column, delegate )
00156 
00157                 view.setViewSettings( ViewSettings.load( view.id ) )
00158                 screen.group.setAllowRecordLoading( True )
00159 
00160                 return view
00161
